He( Jonathan) knows that that's what we do and want to do, and certainly that's what Gabrielle Giffords will do and want to do in her future, Kirsten Gillibrand said. I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairman of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. He added looters had also ransacked the ticket office. More distracted TTC driver photos surface

By 2013 we will have one of the most fuel-efficient fleets, Sergio Marchionne said Wednesday in announcing a demonstration fleet of up to 20 hydraulic hybrid Chrysler Town& Country minivans. Fuel economy on the minivans should improve 60 percent in city driving and 30 percent to 35 percent overall.
